# How-to Guides

Use these guides when you know what you want to achieve and need a concrete recipe.

- [Configure Cloud Storage](configure-cloud-storage.md) – AWS, GCP, Azure setup
- [Work with Filesystems](work-with-filesystems.md) – Local and remote operations
- [Read and Write Datasets](read-and-write-datasets.md) – JSON, CSV, Parquet operations
- [Merge Datasets](merge-datasets.md) – DuckDB and PyArrow merge strategies
- [Use SQL Filters](use-sql-filters.md) – Cross-framework filtering
- [Sync and Manage Files](sync-and-manage-files.md) – File synchronization
- [Optimize Performance](optimize-performance.md) – Caching, parallelism, and memory usage
